mapper.sql: id, orderId, tranceId, money, channel, state, remark, notify_url, params, careate_time, update_time, send, payorderId
mapper.insert: insert into t_pay_detail (id, orderId, tranceId, money, channel, state, remark, notify_url, params, careate_time, update_time, send, payorderId) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{send,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_pay_detail
orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tranceId = #{tranceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_pay_detail set orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tranceId = #{tranceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notify_url = #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, careate_time = #{careateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send = #{send,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payorderId = #{payorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from t_pay_detail t
order by careate_time DESC
mapper.delete: delete from t_pay_detail where state in (#{state}) and orderId=#{orderId}
